headline: WEST-BOND K 1100-3
keywords: wire bonders  bonder  wedge bonder  wire bonder
specstable:
Manufacturer West-Bond
Model K 1100-3
Description Automatic Wire Despooler
Other Information
  • Automatic Wire Despooler.
  • Pays out bond wire at 1.0 in./sec. from either 1/2 in. or 2 in. wire spools.
  • Maintains constant slack with zero drag.
  • Announces end of wire stock.
  • ESD Protection
Power Requirements 115 V 60 Hz 1 Phase
Condition Very Good
Weight 6 lb (3 kg)
Exterior Dimensions
Width 5.000 in (12.7 cm)
Depth 6.000 in (15.2 cm)
Height 4.000 in (10.2 cm)
